analysis: The project appears to be a beach-themed website with a summer vibe. The current files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a test website. The event suggests adding water-related elements and ensuring all buttons work properly. The existing to-dos indicate that the mobile menu and button functionality need to be improved.

improvements.description: Update the CSS to include water-themed colors and summer elements, such as blues and sandy tones, and ensure all buttons have consistent styling and hover effects.
Ensure all buttons in the HTML have proper event handlers and are styled according to the summer theme.
Complete the JavaScript functionality to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and interactions, including any mobile menu toggles.
